explains: v. 惹怒，使恼火；用荨麻刺伤或鞭打（某人）
wordGroup: grasp the nettle v. 迎着困难上

sentences.en: Nettle were thus able to see just how picky women are, given the chance.
sentences.cn: 这样一来，内特尔就可以看出女人是多么挑剔。

sentences.en: They are all heroes grasping the nettle.
sentences.cn: 他们都是迎着艰险上的英雄。

sentences.en: And what is required for the nettle?
